bibl.title: Alfonso Gagliardi v. T.W. Lynch. Bond
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: KNOW ALL MEN BY THESE PRESENTS, That we ALFONSO GAGLIARDI, as principaland ANGELO MARRA, as surety, are held and firmly bound unto the United States of America well and truly to be paid the sum of ONE THOUSAND DOLLARS ($1,000.00), to which payment we bind ourselves, our heirs and representatives:
The condition of this obligation is such:

That, WHEREAS, there has heretofore been issued by the Secretary of Labor of the United States, a warrant of deportation for the above named ALFONSO GAGLIARDI, and there has heretofore been instituted in the above entitled action, which said action is now pending; and
WHEREAS the said ALFONSO GAGLIARDI has moved the Court that he be enlarged upon bond in the said sum of ONE THOUSAND ($1,000) DOLLARS, pending the final determination of said matter;

NOW THEREFORE, if the above named ALFONSO GAGLIARDI, shall well and truly perform the conditions imposed upon him by said bond, and shall present himself by and pursuant to the order of the Court herein, and abide by the judgment of the Court in this cause, this obligation shall be null and void, otherwise to be in full force and effect.
Dated at Seattle, Washington, this 23rd day of December, 1921
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 23rd day of December, 1921.
Notary Public in and for the State of Washington residing at Seattle.

I, Angelo Warra, a resident of the above entitled District do solemnly swear that after paying my just debts and liabilities, I am worth $1000 in spearate property over and above all just debts and liabilities and property exempt from execution.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 23rd day of December, 1921.
Notary Public in and for the State of Washington residing at Seattle.

IT IS HEREBY STIPULATED by and between counsel for the United States of America and for the above named Alfonso Gagliardi that the bonds heretofore deposited with the Commissioner of Immigration and this day transferred by Assignment, shall be pledged as surety to secure the obligation of the above described bond.
Attorney for the United States of America
In the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington
Filed in the United States District Court
